displayName: Amazon RDS DB instances should not be idle
All publicly accessible API's behind API gateway should be protected atleast one custom authorizer
IAM users should not be inactive for more than 90 days
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default MONGO DB port 27017
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on SSH port 22
EC2 instances should not have any publicly accessible ports
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on ports which are < 1024
EC2 instances should not be in stopped state for more than 60 days
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default port 20
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default SQL Browser port 1434
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on SMTP port 25
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on UDP port 53
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on CIFS port 445
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 21
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default Mini SQL Server 4333
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default MySQL port 3306
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 137
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 138
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 443
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 80
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 8080
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default POSTGRESQL port 5432
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default WINDOWS RDP port 3389
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on port 135
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on SQL Server port 1433
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on Telnet port 23
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on VNC port 5500
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on VNC port 5900
IAM accesskey must be rotated every 90 days
All AWS accounts should follow the IAM password policy
Loadbalncer's should not be idle
Amazon EC2 instances should not have low utilization
Non Admin IAM roles should not have full IAM access
RDS snapshot should not be publicly accessible
Non whitelisted S3 buckets should not be publicly accessible for read
Non whitelisted S3 buckets should not be publicly accessible for write
Security groups should not have inbound rule allowing 0.0.0.0/0 for non DMZ resources
Security group with RDP port 3389 should not be open to internet
Amazon EBS volumes should not be underutilized
Amazon Redshift clusters should not be underutilized
Security groups should not be in unused state
Application ELB should not be in unused state
Classic ELB should not be in unused state
EBS volumes should not be in unused state
Elastic Ip's should not be in unused state
VPC flowlogs should be enabled for all VPCs
Deprecated EC2 instances types should not be used to launch instances
EC2 instances should not be publicly accessible on default ELASTIC SEARCH port 9200
RDS database endpoints should not be publicly accessible
